TextView.android:text:
DJANGO WORKSHOP 8 TH OF OCT.

Fees: RS 150
 MAX COUNT: 100
 Prize:
 Winner: T-Shirt and RS 1500
 1 st Runner up: T-Shirt and RS 1000
 2 nd Runner up: T-Shirt and RS 500- (OPTIONAL)
 Structure:
 Theme: Blog
 Content :
 1)HTML
 2)CSS
 3)DJANGO
 INSTRUCTIONS WHILE TAKING ENTRIES:
 1. Make sure that participant has Laptop or
 not.And also note configuration of laptop.
 2. Tell them that at the end we will be having
 complete website .As well tell them that we have
 demonstration of hosting .
 3. Mention at end there will be contest and
 prizes(T-shirt and money).
 4. Tell them Company which uses DJNAGO:
 o Instagram. ...
 o Mozilla Firefox. ...
 o Pinterest.
 o NASA. ...
 5. Why Django??
 - Easy to learn, Easy to use
 - Readable Code Format
 - Most Widely used
 - Secure than PHP
 - FullStack Developer
 Perks:
 Certificate ,Complete website as project,prizes and
 refreshment
